name: Camilla's Notebook
description:
A 'treasure hunt' assignment made in a week for my Intermediate Game Development class

Fiona's about to go on a date but needs to find the book her partner left before leaving! Guess you might as well search it.

CONTROLS:
Up Arrow - Move Forward
Back Arrow - Move Backwards
Left Arrow - Turn Left
Right Arrow - Turn Right
Space - Interact with objects / proceed text

KNOWN ISSUES:
- You can clip through the wall sorta??
- When interacting with objects sometimes nothing happens
( Try moving a little more!! Sorry about that!!)
- During 'cutscenes' you need to press space an extra time to get it to end
- You can find the final thing first, but nothing happens until you activate the other 'cutscenes'.
- Your cat can push you out the way (lol)
